Package stars

Class UserDatabase

java.lang.Object
stars.FlatFileDatabase<User_details>
stars.UserDatabase
public class UserDatabase
extends FlatFileDatabase<User_details>
Database class that implements FlatFileDatabase that handles stores and handles User_details objects. This class can be instantiated with a file that contains User_detials data in flat file format, and is able to write its contents back to a file in the same format. Users in this database are indexed by their usernames.
Since:
2020/11/14
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lai Ming Hui

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add​(User_details obj)
      Adds a user object into this database. users are indexed by their usernames if User_details does not have a non-null username, this method will not add the object and returns.
      Overrides:
      add in class FlatFileDatabase<User_details>
      Parameters:
